ComicInfo.Title: Prog 1936
ComicInfo.Summary:
Harry Absalom is on the trail of a church-sanctioned strike-squad in the latest edition of 2000 AD – out on Wednesday from all good Thrll-merchants! In this week’s edition of the Galaxy’s Greatest Comic: Judge Dredd: Blood of Emeralds by Michael Carroll, Colin MacNeil, Chris Blythe and Annie Parkhouse; Absalom: Under A False Flag by Gordon Rennie, Tiernan Trevallion, and Simon Bowland; the conclusion of Sláine: The Brutania Chronicles – Primordial by Pat Mills, Simon Davis, and Ellie De Ville; Helium by Ian Edginton, D’Israeli, and Ellie De Ville, plus the brand new series of Outlier by TC Eglington, Karl Richardson and Annie Parkhouse.
Cover: Tiernen Trevallion
Judge Dredd - Blood of Emeralds (Part Three) (Michael Carroll - Colin Macneil)Absalom - Under A False Flag (Part Three) (Gordon Rennie - Tiernen Trevallion)Sláine: The Brutania Chronicles Book Two - Primordial (Part Thirteen) (Pat Mills - Simon Davis)Outlier - Dark Symmetries (Part Two) (T C Eglington - Karl Richardson)Helium (Part Three) (Ian Edginton - D'Israeli)
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-09-24 16:17:39. [CVDB493115]
